LanguageData.AmbrosiaAddiction.label: ambrosia addiction
LanguageData.AmbrosiaAddiction.description: A chemical addiction to ambrosia. Long-term presence of ambrosia has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug.\n\nWithout regular doses of ambrosia, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction.
LanguageData.AmbrosiaHigh.label: ambrosia warmth
LanguageData.AmbrosiaHigh.description: Ambrosia chemicals in the bloodstream. It lifts the mood.
LanguageData.AmbrosiaTolerance.label: ambrosia tolerance
LanguageData.AmbrosiaTolerance.description: A built-up tolerance to ambrosia. The more severe this tolerance is, the more ambrosia it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.AmbrosiaTolerance.stages.small.label: small
LanguageData.AmbrosiaTolerance.stages.large.label: large
LanguageData.AmbrosiaTolerance.stages.massive.label: massive
